Template¶

class src.template.Template(name, residues)[source]¶
class Template¶

This class groups informations about a template sequence/structure.

name¶

Name of the template

Type:str
residues¶

Template’s sequence of residues as list of Residues objects

Type:list of Residue object
benchmark¶

Fold family type of the template: 3: Family, 2: Superfamily, 1: Fold and 0: None It tells how similar the template is from the query structure. This is necessary to be able to benchmark the new scoring functions.

Type:int
pdb¶

PDB filename of the template

Type:str
parse_pdb()[source]¶

Parse the pdb file and set the CA coordinates.

set_benchmark(fold_type)[source]¶

Sets the benchmark attribute of the template.

Parameters:fold_type (int) – 3: Family, 2: Superfamily, 1: Fold and 0: None
set_pdb_name(metafold_dict)[source]¶

Set the pdb file name of the template from the template’s name.

Parameters:metafold_dict – A dictionary with key = template name and value = pdb file
